content: विधानं {@--1@} Arranging, disposing. {@--2@} Performing, making, doing, executing; नेपथ्यविधानं <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; आज्ञा°, यज्ञ° &c. {@--3@} Creation, creating; <ls>R. 6. 11</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 14</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 66.</ls> {@--4@} Employment, use, application; प्रतिकारविधानं <ls>R. 8. 40.</ls> {@--5@} Prescribing, enjoining, ordering. {@--6@} A rule, precept, ordinance, sacred rule or precept, sacred injunction; <ls>Ms. 9. 148</ls>; <ls>Bg. 16. 24</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">17. 24.</ls> {@--7@} Mode, manner. {@--8@} A means or expedient. {@--9@} Performance of prescribed acts or rites. {@--10@} A rite, ceremony. {@--11@} Gaining, obtaining. {@--12@} Affixing, prefixing (as terminations, suffixes &c.). {@--13@} The food given to elephants (to make them intoxicated); विधानसंपादितदानशोभितैः <ls>K.</ls> (where विधान means ‘rule’ also); उत्क्षिप्तहस्ततलदत्तविधानपिंडस्नेहस्रुतिस्नपितबाहुरिभाधिराजं <ls>Śi. 5. 51.</ls> {@--14@} Wealth. {@--15@} Pain, agony, torment, distress. {@--16@} An act of hostility.
